mapper.update: update table_request set create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, table_no = #{tableNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, battle_no = #{battleNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fit_no = #{fitNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xian_card = #{xianCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, create_time, table_no, battle_no, fit_no, card, xian_card, result, status, remark from table_request
